title: Inventory System
content: Add your things and organize them in lists.

title: Visual
content: Upload pictures of your things. Find things even when you do not know their name.

title: Social
content: Send friend requests to your friends. Share your things with them or even with their friends!

title: Free and Open Source. Ready to self host
content: Your things, your data. Run your own instance for you and your friends.

title: Notifications
content: Get notifications about friend requests, new things and shares.

title: Searchable
content: Full text search of your things and the things that are shared with you.
